directions: Stir tomato juice, orange juice, dark beer, dill pickle juice, Worcestershire sauce, salsa, horseradish, beef base, black pepper, celery salt, and hot pepper sauce in a large container until beef base and celery salt have dissolved.
ingredients: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle dark beer
1 tablespoon hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco®), or to taste
title: Dick's Bloody Mary Mix
